column1: These types of cars do not have any kind of internal combustion engine
column2: but are driven entirely using electric motors
column3: which gets its power in different ways other than an engine.A fuel cell makes electricity from hydrogen. Hydrogen is very common
column4: but hard to store. It can be made from water but is usually made from natural gas. These cars are very rare
column5: because there are not many places where one can fill up with hydrogen
column6: and so not many are made. One of the few companies who makes fuel cell cars is Toyota
column7: which has the Mirai.A solar cell stores energy from the sun as electricity to make the car go. But the sunlight that lands on a solar car is not enough to make a full-sized car move very fast
column8: and cannot work at night unless it stores energy somewhere. There is a competition every year to see who can make a car that goes the farthest on only solar power.
